segments.text: I notice the water just keeps pouring out of the sink, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on that plate—doesn’t she feel the water on her feet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall any second now, and his sister is just standing there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how careless everyone is being right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen is going to be ruined if this keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is almost empty, and the kids are still grabbing more.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and the boy doesn’t even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever turn around and see what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading everywhere, and the floor is going to be a slipping hazard soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a mess, and no one is doing anything to fix it.
segments.speaker: PAR
